channel.title: Please help server getting hacked
channel.description:
Hello there moparscapers well today 2 strange guys came in and wrote some wired codes into the chat and it allowed them to hack us , with hacking means banning the server owner (me) and removing peoples clients everything! they cant conect to the server anymore please help wtf is this, i only know they are dutch and puted some strange codes into the chat starting with 0 Please help
Its clear this isnt just a cheat client but how can i stop this and how the fuck do they do this?

item.title: Please help server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

Could be IP banned search for the file ‘bannedIPS’ or try in game ::unipban x (x being their username)

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @jaktie123 jaktie123
item.description:
@jaktie123 wrote:

YEAAAAH SOO freaking awsome really thanks brooo But how can the people he disabled join again their clients stuck at 0% checking for updates since the people he didnt touch can still acces the server ,

Also What does he actually do or what is the error in the code? any clue?

Thankyou soo dang much man!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @James6213 James6213
item.description:
@James6213 wrote:

Lol dragonkk?

WorldPacketsDecoder.java

Search for:

Replace with:

Above that, add this:

if(message.contains("0hdr2ufufl9ljlzlyla") || message.contains("0hdr")) return;

LoginPacketsDecoder.java

Find:

Above that, add:

if (username.contains("ffsdragonkk")) { session.getLoginPackets().sendClientPacket(20); return; }

Then Compile and run server all fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @jaktie123 jaktie123
item.description:
@jaktie123 wrote:

My server base is rune evolution the code he puted in was something like 0hs1dg something olike that and then he could ban unban or get peoples ip everything they used serval comands like 0hs1dg 0hs2dg 0hs3dg also longer ones i really cant remember im not even sure or this are the codes, how the hell can i get into my server every one can except 3 guys that are kinda disabled to acces it ill rep++ + donate if anyone can help me out

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server getting hacked
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

protip; when performing command checks; don’t do it by name/rights, do it by ip.

also; please tell me the server base
